item.title: The Blogger's Secret: Repetition is the very soul of the net
item.description:
"Repetition the very soul of the net."  alt.config

"Self-plagiarism is style."  Alfred Hitchcock.

thus repeating a blog post from a while ago, which just came to mind as I was looking a postcard that someone sent to me in March after reading this list.

Ten secrets to success (or, ten things that I aspire to doing regularly)

1.  Send a postcard.

2.  Go for a walk.

3.  Use the library.

4.  Keep your inbox at zero.

5.  Find a group to go to lunch with regularly.

6.  Say thank you.

7.  Keep track of what you do.

8.  Keep track of what you promise to do.

9.  Always carry something to write with.

10.  Get enough sleep.

I wish I could say that I do all this, but at least it's something to aim for. And I wish I had the infinite patience to hyperlink all of these, but I don't, so take it on faith that I've thought about and written about them before.

and I'll add one more for good measure:

11.  Invoice promptly and accurately.
